cause.description:
my little sisters son drowned today at the age of 4 at willow lake.Im starting this cause to help raise funds to burry Quinn.I am reaching out to my friends and hopefuly you will pass this to your friends and so on.Quinn was autistic but it didnt stop him from enjoying his short lived life.My sister Molly doesnt have the funds to burry her only child.So please help if you can email me at kidchico33@hotmail.com anything would be much appericated and i will give more info then.all donations can be made at any credit union.thank you all in this time of need
1. quinns burrial fund
cause.name: quinns burrial fund
